attributes.action: Stop the development of the super dairy farm proposed in Lincolnshire
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This intensive 'farming' will involve up to 9000 cows living in sheds like battery hens and being milked three times a day.
The cows will only go outside for a short period or the year when they are not producing milk.

Concerns for this system:
- Animal cruelty - all farmed animals should have access to the sun and outdoors on a daily basis
- Destruction of the local area - up to 60 lorry movements a day onto the local B road
- Thousands of unwanted calves separated from their mothers very young and transported away at three weeks old
- Damage to the UK dairy industry - other smaller producers who care for their animals and the environment being put out of business

This is a huge backwards step for british farming!!!  We would rather pay a little more for our milk and have it produced in an ethical way!
